data.eml:eml: First record of the globally invasive crab, Charybdis hellerii (A. Milne-Edwards, 1867), in Benin, with notes on its taxonomy (Crustacea, Decapoda, Brachyura, Portunidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dessouassi, Comlan Eugène, Lalèyè, Philippe A., ’ Udekem, Cédric (2019): First record of the globally invasive crab, Charybdis hellerii (A. Milne-Edwards, 1867), in Benin, with notes on its taxonomy (Crustacea, Decapoda, Brachyura, Portunidae). Zootaxa 4576 (2): 201-238, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4576.2.1
